page.title: 17Food
page.content: My mum, sister and I usually go to the supermarket, Sainsbury's, once a month to do our main food shopping. We get all the food we think we need and put most of it into our freezer. Most people in this area have an{electric cooker, some have{gas,}and quite a few also have a{microwave oven}which can cook a cake in four minutes I think more people in towns eat more take_away food or "junk food" as it is called, than we do in this area, for it is easier for them to visit afast food shop. People here tend to eat fish and chips as a treat, or if they are late home from town. On a week day I usually start with two slices of toast or cereal.At 10.20am I will have an apple or a few biscuits.At mid_day I have two sandwiches,an apple, and a piece of cake. At night I have a cooked meal like{chips peas}and{bacon.
